message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $110. I think you'll find it's a great deal for the value it provides.
I appreciate your time, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the product is quite valuable. How about we meet in the middle at $100?
I'm not sure I can go up to $100, Alice. I was thinking more along the lines of $95. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
